bike.description: S-Works FACT 11r carbon, FACT IS construction, women's tubesets, women's performance geometry, tapered 1-1/8" to 1-3/8" HT, OSBB

components.description: S-Works FACT carbon, full monocoque, 1-1/8" to 1-3/8" tapered steerer
1-1/8" upper and 1-3/8" lower Cr-Mo cartridge bearings, w/ 20mm carbon cone spacer and 20mm of carbon spacers
Press-in OSBB cups w/ ceramic bearings
Chainstay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
